metadata.title: CVE-2014-3541 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Repositories component in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11,2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.x before 2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 allowsremote attackers to conduct PHP object injection attacks and executearbitrary code via serialized data associated with an add-on.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
